title: Proactive Pseudo-Intervention: Pre-informed Contrastive Learning For Interpretable Vision Models
details: D Wang, Y Yang, L Chen, Z Gan, R Henao, L Carin - AAAI Bridge Program on AI for …, 2025
abstract: Deep neural networks excel at comprehending complex visual signals, delivering on par or even superior performance to that of human experts. However, ad-hoc visual explanations of model decisions often reveal an alarming level of reliance on …
